message:
is there any way we can get more detail from court about what it's doing and have that as a voice if that's okay or do a an update on Claude because I see it saying thinking about what it's doing also when it's running agents is it possible to get information about what's going on with each of the agents for example below I have no idea what's going on with these 

just give me as much information as possible information should be in natural text as well and if it's voice capable then put it in the voice systems in here what's going on 

. Agent ae5df43 (Settings page): Reading files and working on simplifying the settings page to show API system configuration
2. Agent a20768e (Clear Data button): Reading the index.html, insuredhq.html, and main.py to implement the clear data feature

I'll wait for them to complete their tasks.

---
[AGENT MODE: Development] Full development mode. First use Explore agents to understand the codebase, then Plan agents to design the approach, then implement.

/orchestrate
